item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - Selling pressure continues
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - Selling pressure continues

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candlestick analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.

item.title: Simplefx - The Simplest Way to use Bitcoin in Forex Trading - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Simplefx - The Simplest Way to use Bitcoin in Forex Trading - NEWSBTC

Forex trading has long been the safe haven for Bitcoin investors to protect against the Bitcoin volatility. The forex trading industry is very attractive when it comes to volume. It is the most active trading industry, so it has been the first choice for Bitcoiners when it comes to protecting against volatility.

item.title: 'Grumpy hold-outs' could sink Bitfinex recovery plan after Bitcoin theft
item.description:
'Grumpy hold-outs' could sink Bitfinex recovery plan after Bitcoin theft

Cost-sharing plan could breach Bitfinex terms and conditions * Lawyers say its compensation token also open to challenge * Hackers stole $72 mln of bitcoin from Bitfinex user accounts * Some users say Bitfinex plan could still be best option By Clare Baldwin HONG KONG, Aug 15 Crypto-currency exchange Bitfinex's plan to impose losses on all its trading clients for the theft by hackers of $72 million in Bitcoin rests on two flawed pillars, according to lawyers.

item.title: Nimirum.org - on a mission to end online censorship with blockchain technology
item.description:
Nimirum.org - on a mission to end online censorship with blockchain technology

Nimirum is a completely decentralized forum platform powered by blockchain technology. We will be creating an autonomous system with no moderators or admins where everyone is equal. Studies from freedomhouse.org show censorship on the internet has increased as of 2015. For that reason, a platform like nimirum is vital for the good of the internet.

item.title: FGC: I know my customers and my customers know me
item.description:
FGC: I know my customers and my customers know me

Common sense kicks in following the Bitfinex Hack Those of us involved in the cryptocurrency space right now are all certified early adopters and we wear that badge with great pride. We are individualists, a bit edgy and a bit libertarian.

item.title: Security Behind Bitcoin Online Gambling
item.description:
Security Behind Bitcoin Online Gambling

Bitcoin experts now believe that the ruling will give the virtual currency a much needed boos First up, a little background. The original Bitcoin was launched by secretive and elusive computer programmer, Satoshi Nakamoto in 2008.

item.title: Mimblewimble: A Stripped-Down Bitcoin Version Improves Privacy, Fungibility and Scalability
item.description:
Mimblewimble: A Stripped-Down Bitcoin Version Improves Privacy, Fungibility and Scalability

A slimming down of the bitcoin protocol called Mimblewimble generates a blinding factor that can prove ownership of bitcoins, making private keys unnecessary, and offering a solution to the need to balance bitcoin privacy against fungibility while also improving scalability, according to a white paper that appeared mysteriously on a bitcoin research site authored by a person using a pseudonym, according to Nasdaq.

item.title: Bitcoin Center NYC CTO Andrew Martin Passes Away At Age 21
item.description:
Bitcoin Center NYC CTO Andrew Martin Passes Away At Age 21

The Bitcoin Center in New York City has been one of the most prominent places to discuss and trade cryptocurrency every week. Over the years this location has grown out from a niche crowd to attracting people from all over the city and beyond.
